name: Sin Seekers
flavorText: Bolts pulled from this quiver instinctively seek out demonic blood.
flavorTextHtml: Bolts pulled from this quiver instinctively seek out demonic blood.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
